name: We Love Tracy Beaker
description:
* FIRST EVER OFFICIAL JACQUELINE WILSON'S TRACY BEAKER LICENSED APP *

We Love Tracy Beaker is a totally fantastic Planner, Calendar and Address Book where all Jacqueline Wilson's Tracy Beaker fans can store their most brilliant special stuff. Amazingly it comes complete with 7 mini-games and activities all in ONE super cool app.

Guaranteed to entertain for hours, you can test your Tracy Beaker Trivia knowledge and even write your own questions to impress your mates; receive new interactive ‘scratch-cards’ every day with the chance to win exclusive extra features and use Tracy’s Magic Orb to discover the answers to many tip-top questions like who really fancies you?

We Love Tracy Beaker and hope you do too!

"A treasure trove of Tracy treats including puzzles, games, fortune-telling and a personal organiser" Junior Magazine

"This is a fun, inexpensive but well produced app that girls of varying ages will get plenty of fun from with some handy applications which means it can be used again and again" Loughborough Echo

FEATURES INCLUDE:

Totally fantastic Planner, Calendar and Address Book to store all your important stuff.

Plus 7 great mini-games and activities – All in ONE super cool app:

• TRACY'S MAKE-OVER – create your own avatar. Change face and body shape, hair style and colour and makeup!

• TRACY'S WORD SEARCH – find a fun list of fun words hidden in a grid of letters before time runs out!

• TRACY'S DAYDREAM DOODLES – create fun scenes by dragging familiar icons onto a selected background. Save doodles and view them at any time!

• TRACY'S TRIVIA QUIZ – answer hundreds of multiple choice trivia question. Plus have fun making up your own questions and answers!

• TRACY'S MATCH 3 GAME – Match 3,4 or 5 fun shapes in a row or column to score as many points as you can in 60 seconds!

• TRACY'S SCRATCHIES – scratch off 3 matching symbols and you may unlock an exclusive feature in one of the Tracy Beaker games or activities. Play every day to unlock new hidden fun!

• TRACY'S MAGIC ORB – Ask Tracy a question and then give the magic orb a shake to reveal a magical answer!

• In-game achievements link to Apple's Game Centre.

P2 GAMES CUSTOMER CARE PLEDGE
